data.title: Donor List
data.text:
We are pleased to recognize our donors who have given cumulatively $10,000 or more in support of Holland Bloorview Kids Rehabilitation Hospital Foundation. We are filled with gratitude for every donation and thank you for helping to create a world of endless possibilities for kids with disabilities.

2021 - 2022 Annual Donor Listing

In 2021-22, a world of endless possibilities emerges from your generosity; the possibilities of kids' ambitions fulfilled, transformational research, academic research in the field of pediatric disability and providing support to families in critical times. We see improvement to the quality of life for thousands of people with our programs and services and thanks to your philanthropic support to Holland Bloorview Foundation. We are filled with gratitude for every donation and thank you for helping to create a world of endless possibilities for kids with disabilities.
